name: Russian Nesting Dolls
description: Hand-painted by trained monkeys, these exquisite dolls are priceless! And by "priceless," we mean "extremely expensive"! 8 entire dolls per set! Octuple the presents!

name: Fish Painting
description: If something seems fishy about this painting, it's because it's a fish! Also hand-painted by trained monkeys!

name: Dead Parrot
description: This is an ex-parrot! Or maybe he's only resting?

name: Mystery Box
description: If you love suprises, this mystery box is for you! Do not place on light-colored surfaces. May cause oil staining. Keep your friends guessing!
